TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit Freezable extends System.Windows.DependencyObject
Public MustInherit Class Freezable Inherits DependencyObject
public ref class Freezable abstract : System::Windows::DependencyObject

summary.span: 定义具有可修改状态和只读（冻结）状态的对象。

span.span: Defines an object that has a modifiable state and a read-only (frozen) state.

summary.span: 派生自 的类提供详细的更改通知，可以是不可变的，并且可以进行自我克隆。

span.span: Classes that derive from provide detailed change notification, can be made immutable, and can clone themselves.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供特殊功能，可帮助提高应用程序性能，使用非常昂贵修改或复制的对象时。The class provides special features that can help improve application performance when using objects that are expensive to modify or copy. 示例对象包括以下：Examples of objects include the following: - - - - - ## 派生自可冻结Deriving From Freezable 派生自的类可以获得以下功能：A class that derives from gains the following features: - 特殊的状态： 只读 （冻结） 状态和可写状态。Special states: a read-only (frozen) state and a writable state. - 线程安全： 冻结可以跨线程共享对象。Thread safety: a frozen object can be shared across threads. - 详细的更改通知： 与其他不同对象，对子属性值更改时，对象提供更改通知。Detailed change notification: Unlike other objects, a object provides change notifications when sub-property values change. - 轻松克隆： 可冻结类已实现生成深层克隆的几种方法。Easy cloning: the Freezable class has already implemented several methods that produce deep clones. 有关如何使用和创建你自己对象，请参阅[可冻结对象概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。For information on using and creating your own objects, see [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).

threadsafe.span: 任何公共此类型的成员都是线程安全。

span.span: Any public members of this type are thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 但不保证所有实例成员都是线程安全的。

span.span: Any instance members are not guaranteed to be thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 当属性是、可以仅从在其创建的线程访问对象。

span.span: When the property is , a object can be accessed only from the thread on which it was created.

threadsafe.span: 尝试访问从另一个线程引发。

span.span: Attempting to access it from another thread throws an .

threadsafe.span: 和方法封送处理到正确的线程提供支持。

span.span: The and methods provide support for marshalling to the correct thread.

threadsafe.span: 当其属性是，对象是自由线程。

span.span: When their property is , objects are free-threaded.

threadsafe.span: 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Freezable 对象概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。

span.span: For more information, see [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).

summary.span: 初始化 派生类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of a derived class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是一个抽象类的受保护的可访问性构造函数。This is the protected-accessibility constructor of an abstract class.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否可将对象变为不可修改。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the object can be made unmodifiable.

value.span: 如果当前对象可以变为不可修改，或者已经不可修改，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the current object can be made unmodifiable or is already unmodifiable; otherwise, .

para.span: 此方法实现使用方法替换设置为以确定是否可变为不可修改。

span.span: This method implementation uses the method with set to to determine whether a can be made unmodifiable.

para.span: 若要修改此属性在派生类中的行为的方式，重写方法。

span.span: To modify the way this property behaves in a derived class, override the method.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Changed As EventHandler

summary.span: 在修改 或其包含的对象时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the or an object it contains is modified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你尝试添加或移除事件处理程序时的当前对象不是可修改 (时属性是`true`)，将引发异常。If you attempt to add or remove event handlers when the current object is not modifiable (when the property is `true`), an exception is thrown.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Freezable Clone() cil managed

summary.span: 创建 的一个可修改复本，从而制作该对象的值的深层副本。

span.span: Creates a modifiable clone of the , making deep copies of the object's values.

summary.span: 在复制此对象的依赖属性时，此方法会复制表达式（可能不再解析），但不复制动画或其当前值。

span.span: When copying the object's dependency properties, this method copies expressions (which might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.

returns.span: 当前对象的可修改复本。

span.span: A modifiable clone of the current object.

returns.span: 即使源的 属性为 ，所克隆对象的 属性也为

span.span: The cloned object's property is even if the source's property is

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和方法生成的可修改克隆冻结对象 (方法还可用于克隆未冻结的对象)。The and methods produce modifiable clones of frozen objects (the methods also clone objects that are not frozen). 复本实际上是当前对象的深层副本。The clone is effectively a deep copy of the current object. 下表总结了之间的差异和方法。The following table summarizes the differences between the and methods. |操作Action|克隆方法行为Clone method behavior|CloneCurrentValue 方法行为CloneCurrentValue method behavior| |------------|---------------------------|---------------------------------------| |复制一个依赖项属性，包含的表达式Copying a dependency property that has an expression|该表达式被复制，但可能不再解析。The expression is copied, but might no longer resolve. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Freezable 对象概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。For more information, see [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).|复制该表达式的当前值，但不是表达式本身。The current value of the expression is copied, but not the expression itself.| |复制一个动画的依赖项属性Copying an animated dependency property|该属性的基 （非经过动画处理的） 该值被复制。The property's base (non-animated) value is copied. 不复制动画。Animations are not copied.|该属性的当前动画的该值被复制。The property's current animated value is copied. 不复制动画。Animations are not copied.| 请注意，将不会复制取消设置的属性。Note that unset properties are not copied. 如果未设置的属性具有默认值为冻结，属性的值保持在否则为可修改复本冻结。If an unset property has a default value that is a frozen , that property value remains frozen in the otherwise modifiable clone. ## 线程之间移动可冻结Move a Freezable Between Threads 此方法可用于移动线程之间。This method can be useful for moving a between threads. 首先，请不可修改通过调用其方法。First, make the unmodifiable by calling its method. 现在，可以访问另一个线程和使本地，它可以访问。Now another thread can access the and make a local that it can access.

para.span: 此方法使用生成克隆。

span.span: This method uses to produce the clone.

para.span: 若要修改此方法在派生类中的行为，请重写方法。

span.span: To modify the behavior of this method in a derived class, override the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void CloneCore(class System.Windows.Freezable sourceFreezable) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub CloneCore (sourceFreezable As Freezable)

span.span: The object to clone.

summary.span: 使用基（未经过动画处理的）属性值使该实例成为指定 的克隆（深层复制）。

span.span: Makes the instance a clone (deep copy) of the specified using base (non-animated) property values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法方法应不直接从代码中，除非调用时调用时重写此方法的基实现。This method is called by the method and should not be called directly from your code, except when calling the base implementation while overriding this method. 若要创建当前对象的可修改副本，请调用而不是直接调用此方法。To create a modifiable copy of the current object, call instead of calling this method directly.

block.para:
如果派生自，你可能需要重写此方法。
If you derive from , you may need to override this method.
重写的原因包括：
Reasons to override include the following:
- 在派生的类具有未通过依赖项属性公开的数据。Your derived class has data that is not exposed via dependency properties.
- 在派生的类必须执行额外的初始化工作不能通过只需重写来完成。Your derived class must perform extra initialization work that cannot be accomplished by simply overriding .例如，这一点适用如果派生的类实现。For example, this applies if your derived class implements .依赖项属性中存储所有数据且，不需要执行额外的初始化工作的类无需重写。Classes that store all their data in dependency properties and that do not need to perform extra initialization work do not need to override .这一点至关重要所有实现都调用此方法的基实现。It is essential that all implementations call the base implementation of this method.实现才应执行的默认实现不执行工作。Implementations should only perform work that is not performed by the default implementation.默认实现制作所有可写入的本地设置的属性，包括内部的表达式的深层的副本。The default implementation makes deep copies of all writable, locally set properties, including internal expressions.如果对象具有数据绑定依赖项属性，表达式将被复制，但可能不再解析。If the object has data-bound dependency properties, the expressions are copied but might no longer resolve.有关克隆绑定到数据的对象的详细信息，请参阅[可冻结对象概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。For more information about cloning data-bound objects, see [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).如果该对象具有动画的依赖属性，这些属性的基 （非经过动画处理的） 值将复制。If the object has animated dependency properties, the base (non-animated) value of those properties is copied.不复制动画。Animations are not copied.请注意，取消设置的属性将不会复制，也不是只读的属性。Note that unset properties are not copied, nor are read-only properties.如果此属性具有默认值为冻结，属性的值保持在否则为可修改复本冻结。If such a property has a default value that is a frozen , that property value remains frozen in the otherwise modifiable clone.以下列表总结了此方法的预期的行为：The following list summarizes the expected behavior for this method:
- 生成的副本包含的所有副本子对象。The copy produced contains copies of all sub-objects.
- 取消设置和只读属性不会复制。Unset and read-only properties are not copied.
- 复制表达式。Expressions are copied.
- 这些子对象的任何已冻结上创建。None of these sub-objects are frozen on creation.
- 未冻结本身的副本。The copy itself is not frozen.
- 不复制动画。Animations are not copied.
- 属性基值是复制、 没有最新的动画的值。Only property base values are copied, not current animated values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和方法生成的可修改克隆冻结对象 (方法还可用于克隆未冻结的对象)。The and methods produce modifiable clones of frozen objects (the methods also clone objects that are not frozen). 复本实际上是当前对象的深层副本。The clone is effectively a deep copy of the current object. 下表总结了之间的差异和方法。The following table summarizes the differences between the and methods. |操作Action|克隆方法行为Clone method behavior|CloneCurrentValue 方法行为CloneCurrentValue method behavior| |------------|---------------------------|---------------------------------------| |复制一个依赖项属性，包含的表达式Copying a dependency property that has an expression|该表达式被复制，但可能不再解析。The expression is copied, but might no longer resolve. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Freezable 对象概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。For more information, see [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).|复制该表达式的当前值，但不是表达式本身。The current value of the expression is copied, but not the expression itself.| |复制一个动画的依赖项属性Copying an animated dependency property|该属性的基 （非经过动画处理的） 该值被复制。The property's base (non-animated) value is copied. 不复制动画。Animations are not copied.|该属性的当前动画的该值被复制。The property's current animated value is copied. 不复制动画。Animations are not copied.| 请注意，将不会复制取消设置的属性。Note that unset properties are not copied. 如果未设置的属性具有默认值为冻结，属性的值保持在否则为可修改复本冻结。If an unset property has a default value that is a frozen , that property value remains frozen in the otherwise modifiable clone. ## 线程之间移动可冻结Move a Freezable Between Threads 此方法可用于移动线程之间。This method can be useful for moving a between threads. 首先，请不可通过使用修改其方法。First, make the unmodifiable by using its method. 现在，可以访问另一个线程并使它可以访问的本地克隆。Now another thread can access the and make a local clone that it can access.

para.span: 此方法使用方法来生成克隆;实施者，他们重写必须确保副本未冻结上创建。

span.span: This method uses the method to produce the clone; implementers who override must ensure that the copy is not frozen on creation.

span.span: Makes the instance a modifiable clone (deep copy) of the specified using current property values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法方法应不直接从代码中，除非调用时调用时重写此方法的基实现。This method is called by the method and should not be called directly from your code, except when calling the base implementation while overriding this method. 若要创建当前对象的可修改副本，请调用而不是直接调用此方法。To create a modifiable copy of the current object, call instead of calling this method directly.

block.para:
如果派生自，你可能需要重写此方法。
If you derive from , you may need to override this method.
重写的原因包括：
Reasons to override include the following:
- 在派生的类具有未通过依赖项属性公开的数据。Your derived class has data that is not exposed via dependency properties.
- 在派生的类必须执行额外的初始化工作不能通过只需重写来完成。Your derived class must perform extra initialization work that cannot be accomplished by simply overriding .例如，这一点适用如果派生的类实现。For example, this applies if your derived class implements .依赖项属性中存储所有数据且，不需要执行额外的初始化工作的类无需重写。Classes that store all their data in dependency properties and that do not need to perform extra initialization work do not need to override .这一点至关重要所有实现都调用此方法的基实现。It is essential that all implementations call the base implementation of this method.实现才应执行的默认实现不执行工作。Implementations should only perform work that is not performed by the default implementation.默认实现使所有可写入的本地设置属性的深层副本。The default implementation makes deep copies of all writable, locally set properties.如果对象包含与表达式 （例如数据绑定） 的依赖项属性，但不是表达式本身复制该表达式的当前值。If the object contains dependency properties with expressions (such as a data binding), the current value of the expression is copied but not the expression itself.如果对象具有动画依赖项属性，这些属性的当前的动画的该值被复制，但动画不。If the object has animated dependency properties, the current animated value of those properties is copied, but the animations are not.请注意，取消设置的属性将不会复制，也不是只读的属性。Note that unset properties are not copied, nor are read-only properties.如果此属性具有默认值为冻结，属性的值保持在否则为可修改复本冻结。If such a property has a default value that is a frozen , that property value remains frozen in the otherwise modifiable clone.以下列表总结了此方法的预期的行为。The following list summarizes the expected behavior for this method.
- 生成的副本包含的所有副本子对象。The copy produced contains copies of all sub-objects.
- 取消设置和只读属性不会复制。Unset and read-only properties are not copied.
- 如果一个属性进行动画处理，复制其当前值，但动画本身不是。If a property is animated, its current value is copied, but the animation itself is not.
- 这些子对象的任何已冻结上创建。None of these sub-objects are frozen on creation.
- 未冻结本身的副本。The copy itself is not frozen.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance class System.Windows.Freezable CreateInstance() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.
The new instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是受保护的方法，并且行为的实际特定于对象的实现依赖于重写实现方法，此方法在内部调用。This is a protected method, and the actual object-specific implementations for the behavior are dependent on the override implementation of the method, which this method calls internally.

summary.span: 在派生类中实现时，创建 派生类的新实例。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, creates a new instance of the derived class.
The new instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请勿调用此方法，直接 （但调用基实现中）。Do not call this method directly (except when calling base in an implementation). 内部调用此方法方法时的新实例创建。This method is called internally by the method whenever a new instance of the is created. ## Examples 下面的示例演示的典型实现。The following example shows a typical implementation of . [!code-csharp[freezablesample_procedural#CreateInstanceCoreExample](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/freezablesample_procedural/CSharp/freezablesample.cs#createinstancecoreexample)] [!code-vb[freezablesample_procedural#CreateInstanceCoreExample](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/freezablesample_procedural/visualbasic/freezablesample.vb#createinstancecoreexample)]

para.span: 每个派生的类必须实现此方法。

span.span: Every derived class must implement this method.

para.span: 典型的实现是只需调用默认构造函数并返回结果。

span.span: A typical implementation is to simply call the default constructor and return the result.

summary.span: 使 对象变为不可修改并将其 属性设置为 ，或测试是否可将 对象变为不可修改。

summary.span: 如果 参数为 ，则此方法指示是否可将指定的 变为不可修改。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请勿调用此方法，除非派生自和重写方法。Do not call this method unless you are deriving from and overriding the method. 此方法可能会使用在方法冻结类数据成员本身是对象。This method may be used in the method to freeze class data members that are themselves objects. 它为保险上再次调用此方法已冻结 （不可修改） 的对象。It is alright to call this method again on a object that is already frozen (unmodifiable).

exception.span: 如果 为 ，则表明将 变为不可修改的尝试已失败；对象目前处于未知状态（可能已将其部分冻结）。

span.span: When is , the attempt to make unmodifiable was unsuccessful; the object is now in an unknown state (it might be partially frozen).

para.span: 此方法使用方法来执行不可修改。

span.span: This method uses the method to make the unmodifiable.

para.span: 若要修改冻结行为，请重写方法。

span.span: To modify freezing behavior, override the method.

returns.span: 当 为 时，如果可以将 变为不可修改，则此方法返回 ；如果无法将其变为不可修改，则返回 。

span.span: If is , this method returns if the can be made unmodifiable, or if it cannot be made unmodifiable.

returns.span: 当 为 时，如果指定的 目前已经不可修改，则此方法返回 ，如果无法将其变为不可修改，则返回 。

span.span: If is , this method returns if the if the specified is now unmodifiable, or if it cannot be made unmodifiable.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请勿调用此方法，直接 （但调用基实现中）。Do not call this method directly (except when calling base in an implementation). 内部调用此方法属性 (与`isChecking`等于`true`) 和方法 (与`isChecking`等于`false`)。This method is called internally by the property (with `isChecking` equal to `true`) and the method (with `isChecking` equal to `false`).

para.span: 当类包含不存储使用依赖项属性的数据时，实施者必须重写此方法。

span.span: implementers must override this method when the class contains data that is not stored using dependency properties.

para.span: 典型实现应调用基类，然后调用静态方法对所有类型的类包含，返回的属性仅当所有属性都被冻结 （或可能已被冻结，在指定的情况下为)。

span.span: A typical implementation would call base, then call the static method on all typed properties that the class contains, returning only if all properties were frozen (or could have been frozen, in the case of specifying for ).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Freezable GetAsFrozen() cil managed

summary.span: 使用基（未经过动画处理的）属性值创建 的冻结副本。

span.span: Creates a frozen copy of the , using base (non-animated) property values.

summary.span: 由于副本已冻结，因此将通过引用复制任何冻结的子对象。

span.span: Because the copy is frozen, any frozen sub-objects are copied by reference.
A frozen copy of the .

returns.span: 副本的 属性设置为 。

span.span: The copy's property is set to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应检查属性在调用此方法以验证之前可以冻结。You should check the property before calling this method to verify that the can be frozen. 使用此方法是类似于创建副本都使用，然后冻结其与方法。Using this method is similar to creating a copy using the and then freezing it with the method. 和方法可以提高复制性能，因为它们不会克隆子对象的已冻结; 它们仅将其复制通过引用。The and methods can improve copying performance because they do not clone sub-objects that are already frozen; they only copy them by reference. 下表总结了之间的差异和方法。The following table summarizes the differences between the and methods. |操作Action|GetAsFrozen 方法行为GetAsFrozen method behavior|GetCurrentValueAsFrozen 方法行为GetCurrentValueAsFrozen method behavior| |------------|---------------------------------|---------------------------------------------| |复制一个依赖项属性，包含的表达式Copying a dependency property that has an expression|该方法将引发因为它不能属性。The method throws an because it cannot the property.|复制该表达式的当前值，但不是表达式本身。The current value of the expression is copied, but not the expression itself.| |复制一个动画的依赖项属性Copying an animated dependency property|该属性的基 （非经过动画处理的） 该值被复制。The property's base (non-animated) value is copied. 不复制动画。Animations are not copied.|该属性的当前动画的该值被复制。The property's current animated value is copied. 不复制动画。Animations are not copied.| 请注意，取消设置的属性将不会复制，也不是只读的属性。Note that unset properties are not copied, nor are read-only properties. 若要创建一份，它是未被冻结，使用方法。To create a copy of the that is not frozen, use the method.

exception.span: 无法冻结此 ，因为它包含表达式或经过动画处理的属性。

span.span: The cannot be frozen because it contains expressions or animated properties.

para.span: 此方法使用的虚拟方法来生成克隆。

span.span: This method uses the virtual method to produce the clone.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void GetAsFrozenCore(class System.Windows.Freezable sourceFreezable) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub GetAsFrozenCore (sourceFreezable As Freezable)

span.span: The instance to copy.

summary.span: 使用基（未经过动画处理的）属性值使该实例成为指定的 的冻结复本。

span.span: Makes the instance a frozen clone of the specified using base (non-animated) property values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法方法应不直接从代码中，除非调用时调用时重写此方法的基实现。This method is called by the method and should not be called directly from your code, except when calling the base implementation while overriding this method. 若要创建当前对象的冻结的副本，请调用而不是直接调用此方法。To create a frozen copy of the current object, call instead of calling this method directly.

block.para:
如果派生自可能需要重写此方法。
If you derive from you may need to override this method.
重写的原因包括：
Reasons to override include the following:
- 在派生的类具有未通过依赖项属性公开的数据。Your derived class has data that is not exposed via dependency properties.
- 在派生的类必须执行额外的初始化工作不能通过只需重写来完成。Your derived class must perform extra initialization work that cannot be accomplished by simply overriding .例如，这一点适用如果派生的类实现。For example, this applies if your derived class implements .依赖项属性中存储所有数据且，不需要执行额外的初始化工作的类无需重写。Classes that store all their data in dependency properties and that do not need to perform extra initialization work do not need to override .这一点至关重要所有实现都调用此方法的基实现。It is essential that all implementations call the base implementation of this method.实现才应执行的默认实现不执行工作。Implementations should only perform work that is not performed by the default implementation.默认实现制作任何可冻结的对象和的所有其他可写的浅表副本、 本地设置属性，它包含的深层的副本。The default implementation makes deep copies of any unfrozen freezables and shallow copies of all other writable, locally set properties it contains.如果对象具有数据绑定依赖项属性，表达式将被复制，但可能不再解析;有关克隆绑定到数据的对象的详细信息，请参阅[可冻结对象概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。If the object has data-bound dependency properties, the expressions are copied but might no longer resolve; for more information about cloning data-bound objects, see [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).如果对象具有动画的依赖属性，将复制这些属性的基 （非经过动画处理的） 值。If the object has animated dependency properties, the base (non-animated) values of those properties are copied.不复制动画。Animations are not copied.请注意，取消设置的属性将不会复制，也不是只读的属性。Note that unset properties are not copied, nor are read-only properties.如果你重写此方法，必须调用基实现。If you do override this method, you must call the base implementation.不需要值的复制。You do not need to values as they are copied.结果冻结之前返回。The result is frozen by before being returned.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Freezable GetCurrentValueAsFrozen() cil managed

A frozen copy of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法是类似于创建副本都使用，然后冻结其与方法。Using this method is similar to creating a copy using the and then freezing it with the method. 和方法可以提高复制性能，因为它们不会克隆子对象的已冻结; 它们仅将其复制通过引用。The and methods can improve copying performance because they do not clone sub-objects that are already frozen; they only copy them by reference. 下表总结了之间的差异和方法。The following table summarizes the differences between the and methods. |操作Action|GetAsFrozen 方法行为GetAsFrozen method behavior|GetCurrentValueAsFrozen 方法行为GetCurrentValueAsFrozen method behavior| |------------|---------------------------------|---------------------------------------------| |复制一个依赖项属性，包含的表达式Copying a dependency property that has an expression|该方法将引发因为它不能属性。The method throws an because it cannot the property.|复制该表达式的当前值，但不是表达式本身。The current value of the expression is copied, but not the expression itself.| |复制一个动画的依赖项属性Copying an animated dependency property|该属性的基 （非经过动画处理的） 该值被复制。The property's base (non-animated) value is copied. 不复制动画。Animations are not copied.|该属性的当前动画的该值被复制。The property's current animated value is copied. 不复制动画。Animations are not copied.| 请注意，取消设置的属性将不会复制，也不是只读的属性。Note that unset properties are not copied, nor are read-only properties. 若要创建一份，它是未被冻结，使用方法。To create a copy of the that is not frozen, use the method.

para.span: 此方法使用的虚拟方法来生成克隆。

span.span: This method uses the virtual method to produce the clone.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void GetCurrentValueAsFrozenCore(class System.Windows.Freezable sourceFreezable) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub GetCurrentValueAsFrozenCore (sourceFreezable As Freezable)

span.span: The to copy and freeze.

summary.span: 使当前实例成为指定的 的冻结复本。

span.span: Makes the current instance a frozen clone of the specified .

summary.span: 如果对象具有动画依赖属性，则复制其当前的动画值。

span.span: If the object has animated dependency properties, their current animated values are copied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法方法应不直接从代码中，除非调用时调用时重写此方法的基实现。This method is called by the method and should not be called directly from your code, except when calling the base implementation while overriding this method. 若要创建当前对象的冻结的副本，请调用而不是直接调用此方法。To create a frozen copy of the current object, call instead of calling this method directly.

block.para:
如果派生自，你可能需要重写此方法。
If you derive from , you may need to override this method.
重写的原因包括：
Reasons to override include the following:
- 在派生的类具有未通过依赖项属性公开的数据。Your derived class has data that is not exposed via dependency properties.
- 在派生的类必须执行额外的初始化工作不能通过只需重写来完成。Your derived class must perform extra initialization work that cannot be accomplished by simply overriding .例如，这一点适用如果派生的类实现。For example, this applies if your derived class implements .依赖项属性中存储所有数据且，不需要执行额外的初始化工作的类无需重写。Classes that store all their data in dependency properties and that do not need to perform extra initialization work do not need to override .这一点至关重要所有实现都调用此方法的基实现。It is essential that all implementations call the base implementation of this method.实现才应执行的默认实现不执行工作。Implementations should only perform work that is not performed by the default implementation.默认实现将创建一个新使用方法和使的深层副本，可冻结对象的浅表副本的所有其他可写本地设置和它包含的属性。The default implementation creates a new using the method and makes deep copies of unfrozen freezables and shallow copies of all other writable, locally set properties it contains.如果该对象具有数据绑定依赖项属性，将复制的数据绑定，但是可能不再解析;有关克隆绑定到数据的对象的详细信息，请参阅[可冻结对象概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。If the object has data-bound dependency properties, the data bindings are copied but might no longer resolve; for more information about cloning data-bound objects, see [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).如果对象具有动画依赖项属性，这些属性的当前的动画的该值被复制，但动画不。If the object has animated dependency properties, the current animated value of those properties is copied, but the animations are not.中的只读依赖属性不复制此默认实现。Read-only dependency properties within a are not copied by this default implementation.如果你重写此方法，必须调用基实现。If you do override this method, you must call the base implementation.不需要值的复制。You do not need to values as they are copied.结果冻结之前返回。The result is frozen by before being returned.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsFrozen As Boolean
public: property bool IsFrozen { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示对象当前是否可修改。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the object is currently modifiable.

value.span: 如果对象已被冻结且不可修改，则为 ；如果对象可修改，则为 。

span.span: if the object is frozen and cannot be modified; if the object can be modified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尝试修改的对象时其属性是`true`引发。Attempting to modify an object when its property is `true` throws an . 此属性是只读从对象模型透视。This property is read-only from the object model perspective. 有关文档的某些行为可能涉及"设置到`true`"或类似的语言时讨论的其他方法的行为，但此行为中发生的情况内部类的实例，当该实例的方法操作的抽象类中存在的私有变量。Some of the documentation about behaviors may mention "sets to `true`" or similar language when discussing the behavior of other methods of , but this behavior is happening internally in the class instances, when methods of the instance manipulate the private variables that exist within the abstract class. 若要设置此属性的值，应调用。To set the value of this property, you should call . 这实际上是一次性的操作，以更改属性从默认的初始`false`状态`true`状态。This effectively is a one-time operation to change the property from the initial default `false` state to the `true` state. 没有可用的方法来设置的值返回到`false`。There is no available means to set the value back to `false`. 相反，你无法更改与原始制作的深层副本 (请参阅方法)。Instead, you could change any deep copy made from the original (see the method). 这是设计使然，任何派生的类的行为方式时应用于事例其中模式会很有用。This is by design and is how any derived class should behave when applied to the cases where the pattern is useful.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnChanged() cil managed

summary.span: 修改当前 对象时调用。

span.span: Called when the current object is modified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法时事件发生。This method is called whenever the event occurs.

span.span: Ensures that appropriate context pointers are established for a data member of type that has just been modified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法应由调用继承者每次不作为存储的数据成员设置。This method should be called by inheritors each time a data member that is not stored as a is set. 此方法不需要为调用使用存储的数据成员。This method does not need to be called for data members that are stored using a .

summary.span: 的继承项应当在任何 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api](~/includes/tlasharptla-api-md.md)] 一开始写入不属于依赖项属性的数据成员时调用此方法。

span.span: inheritors should call this method at the beginning of any [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api](~/includes/tlasharptla-api-md.md)] that writes to data members that are not dependency properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法调用若要验证的线程上下文可访问，并且如果引发了异常已冻结实例。This method calls to verify the threading context is accessible, and it throws an exception if the instance is already frozen.

exception.span: 实例已冻结，并且无法写入其成员。

span.span: The instance is frozen and cannot have its members written to.

para.span: 派生自的类应调用之前尝试写入不是依赖项属性的任意成员。

span.span: Classes that derive from should call before attempting to write to any members that are not dependency properties.

para.span: 如果调用中[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api](~/includes/tlasharptla-api-md.md)]，则可以省略调用。

span.span: If you call in an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_api](~/includes/tlasharptla-api-md.md)], you can omit a call to .
